description: A remote island in the East Blue inhabited by the cannibalistic Kumate Tribe. The island has a distinctive shape resembling a bear's paw, with four mountains protruding from the edges like toes. The Buggy Pirates landed here and held a funeral for their captain before being captured by the tribe.

keyEvents.title: Buggy Pirates Funeral
keyEvents.description: The Buggy Pirates hold a funeral ceremony for their captain on Kumate Island, believing him to be dead.
keyEvents.significance: The location where the Buggy Pirates mourned their captain before his dramatic return.

keyEvents.title: Kumate Tribe Captures Buggy Pirates
keyEvents.description: The cannibalistic Kumate Tribe confronts and captures the Buggy Pirates, preparing to cook and eat them.
keyEvents.significance: The danger that necessitates Buggy's rescue of his crew.

keyEvents.title: Defeat of the Kumate Tribe
keyEvents.description: Buggy, Alvida, Mohji, and Cabaji defeat the Kumate Tribe and rescue the captured pirates.
keyEvents.significance: The climactic battle that reunites Buggy with his crew.

statusHistory.reason: Island remains inhabited by the Kumate Tribe
